description: Conducted daily checks on the websites and other deployed applications in Google Cloud Platform
Segmented customer data using Google BigQuery for targeted marketing campaigns
Created a website for selling tickets to the Foam Party New Year's Eve 2024 at Bali Mandira x Azul using Laravel, integrated with a payment gateway
Created a website game open to the public to celebrate Bali Mandira's 43rd Anniversary using Nuxt.js
Created a website virtual business card using Laravel
Created a website headless CMS using Strapi
Created a website for selling Gift Cards, Frontend using Wordpress and backend using Express.js integrated with a payment gateway
Created automation with N8n workflows for various tasks such as alert notifications, data synchronization, and more
Planned and designed the functions and workflows for the system
Created the website interface using Figma
Implemented the design, functions, and workflows using Laravel, PostgreSQL, and Bootstrap
Conducted through manual testing of every script, form, and functionality to identify and fix typos or programming errors
